short_summary: Request for the supply of .303 British blanket ammunition.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the items detailed below. Item 1: Ammunition, through 30 mm. Quantity: 75,000 cartridges - Delivery to Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan on or before 31 December 2024.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Cartridge Calibre .303 British Blank Short**
===========================================================

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the supply of cartridge calibre .303 British Blank Short ammunition.

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

*   **Reference Number**: cb-8956-23283697
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8486-217897/A
*   **Amendment Number**: 9
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-12
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-23T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-12-31

**Procurement Category**
------------------------

*   **UNSPSC**: 46101601 (Defence or law enforcement ammunition)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   **National Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Geographic Region**
---------------------

*   **Regions of Opportunity**: World
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**Technical Requirements**
-------------------------

*   The DND requires the supply of 75,000 cartridges of cartridge calibre .303 British Blank Short ammunition.
*   The ammunition will be delivered to Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan and CFAD Angus, Milton, Ontario, by December 31, 2024.

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

*   There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

**Controlled Goods Requirements**
---------------------------------

*   This procurement may be subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

**Language of Submission**
-------------------------

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Trevor Clark
*   **Contact Email**: trevor.clark@forces.gc.ca
*   **Contact Phone**: (613) 698-5046

**Attachments**
---------------

*   The tender package includes the amendment notices and technical specification documents.

Note: The original text has been rewritten in a more professional and concise manner, with the key information highlighted. Any unnecessary details have been removed to meet the 400-word limit. The rewritten text maintains the original meaning and tone of the original text.  Approved by: [Your Name].
